uvi.description:
net: mdiobus: Fix memory leak in __mdiobus_register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.156 by commit b0feaa8376f52357bf2fd020d0c471713a859728. For more details please see the references link.
